description: - **Friction**: Large document uploads with parsing (MinerU) can take significant time - **Pain point**: Progress tracking exists but users may not understand why processing is slow or what's happening - **Impact**: Users may abandon uploads or create duplicate KBs
title: 2. Knowledge Base Upload & Indexing
